20  package org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.cache;
21  
22  import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.EqualsBuilder;
23  import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.HashCodeBuilder;
24  import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringBuilder;
25  import org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.Principal;
26  import org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.PrincipalAttributesRepository;
27  import org.jasig.services.persondir.IPersonAttributeDao;
28  import org.jasig.services.persondir.IPersonAttributes;
29  import org.jasig.services.persondir.support.merger.IAttributeMerger;
30  import org.slf4j.Logger;
31  import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
32  
33  import javax.validation.constraints.NotNull;
34  import java.io.Closeable;
35  import java.util.Collections;
36  import java.util.HashMap;
37  import java.util.List;
38  import java.util.Map;
39  import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
40  
41  /**
42   * Parent class for retrieval principals attributes, provides operations
43   * around caching, merging of attributes.
44   * @author Misagh Moayyed
45   * @since 4.2
46   */
47  public abstract class AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository implements PrincipalAttributesRepository, Closeable {
48      /** Default cache expiration time unit. */
49      private static final TimeUnit DEFAULT_CACHE_EXPIRATION_UNIT = TimeUnit.HOURS;
50  
51      /** Default expiration lifetime based on the default time unit. */
52      private static final long DEFAULT_CACHE_EXPIRATION_DURATION = 2;
53  
54      private static final long serialVersionUID = 6350245643948535906L;
55  
56      /** Logger instance. */
57      protected final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(getClass());
58  
59      private final IPersonAttributeDao attributeRepository;
60  
61      private final long expiration;
62  
63      private final TimeUnit timeUnit;
64  
65      /**
66       * The merging strategy that deals with existing principal attributes
67       * and those that are retrieved from the source. By default, existing attributes
68       * are ignored and the source is always consulted.
69       */
70      private IAttributeMerger mergingStrategy;
71  
72      /**
73       * Instantiates a new principal attributes repository.
74       * Simply used buy
75       */
76      protected AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository() {
77          this(null, DEFAULT_CACHE_EXPIRATION_DURATION, DEFAULT_CACHE_EXPIRATION_UNIT);
78      }
79  
80      /**
81       * Instantiates a new principal attributes repository.
82       *
83       * @param attributeRepository the attribute repository
84       * @param expiration the expiration
85       * @param timeUnit the time unit
86       */
87      public AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository(final IPersonAttributeDao attributeRepository,
88                                                   final long expiration, final TimeUnit timeUnit) {
89          this.attributeRepository = attributeRepository;
90          this.expiration = expiration;
91          this.timeUnit = timeUnit;
92      }
93  
94      protected final IPersonAttributeDao getAttributeRepository() {
95          return this.attributeRepository;
96      }
97  
98      /**
99       * The merging strategy that deals with existing principal attributes
100      * and those that are retrieved from the source. By default, existing attributes
101      * are ignored and the source is always consulted.
102      * @param mergingStrategy the strategy to use for conflicts
103      */
104     public final void setMergingStrategy(final IAttributeMerger mergingStrategy) {
105         this.mergingStrategy = mergingStrategy;
106     }
107 
108     public final IAttributeMerger getMergingStrategy() {
109         return mergingStrategy;
110     }
111 
112     /**
113      * Convert person attributes to principal attributes.
114      * @param attributes person attributes
115      * @return principal attributes
116      */
117     protected final Map<String, Object> convertPersonAttributesToPrincipalAttributes(
118             final Map<String, List<Object>> attributes) {
119         final Map<String, Object> convertedAttributes = new HashMap<>();
120         for (final Map.Entry<String, List<Object>> entry : attributes.entrySet()) {
121             final List<Object> values = entry.getValue();
122             convertedAttributes.put(entry.getKey(), values.size() == 1 ? values.get(0) : values);
123         }
124         return convertedAttributes;
125     }
126 
127     /***
128      * Convert principal attributes to person attributes.
129      * @param p  the principal carrying attributes
130      * @return person attributes
131      */
132     private Map<String, List<Object>> convertPrincipalAttributesToPersonAttributes(final Principal p) {
133         final Map<String, List<Object>> convertedAttributes = new HashMap<>(p.getAttributes().size());
134         final Map<String, Object> principalAttributes = p.getAttributes();
135 
136         for (final Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : principalAttributes.entrySet()) {
137             final Object values = entry.getValue();
138             final String key = entry.getKey();
139             if (values instanceof List) {
140                 convertedAttributes.put(key, (List) values);
141             } else {
142                 convertedAttributes.put(key, Collections.singletonList(values));
143             }
144         }
145         return convertedAttributes;
146     }
147 
148     /**
149      * Obtains attributes first from the repository by calling
150      * {@link org.jasig.services.persondir.IPersonAttributeDao#getPerson(String)}.
151      *
152      * @param id the person id to locate in the attribute repository
153      * @return the map of attributes
154      */
155     protected final Map<String, List<Object>> retrievePersonAttributesToPrincipalAttributes(final String id) {
156 
157         final IPersonAttributes personAttributes = this.attributeRepository.getPerson(id);
158         if (personAttributes == null) {
159             logger.debug("Could not find principal [{}] in the repository so no attributes are returned.", id);
160             return Collections.emptyMap();
161         }
162 
163         final Map<String, List<Object>> attributes = personAttributes.getAttributes();
164         if (attributes == null) {
165             logger.debug("Principal [{}] has no attributes and so none are returned.", id);
166             return Collections.emptyMap();
167         }
168         return attributes;
169     }
170 
171     @Override
172     public final Map<String, Object> getAttributes(@NotNull final Principal p) {
173         final Map<String, Object> cachedAttributes = getPrincipalAttributes(p);
174         if (cachedAttributes != null && !cachedAttributes.isEmpty()) {
175             logger.debug("Found [{}] cached attributes for principal [{}]", cachedAttributes.size(), p.getId());
176             return cachedAttributes;
177         }
178 
179         if (this.attributeRepository == null) {
180             logger.debug("No attribute repository is defined for [{}]. Returning default principal attributes for {}",
181                     getClass().getName(), p.getId());
182             return cachedAttributes;
183         }
184 
185         final Map<String, List<Object>> sourceAttributes = retrievePersonAttributesToPrincipalAttributes(p.getId());
186         logger.debug("Found [{}] attributes for principal [{}] from the attribute repository.",
187                 sourceAttributes.size(), p.getId());
188 
189         if (this.mergingStrategy == null) {
190             logger.debug("No merging strategy found, so attributes retrieved from the repository will be used instead.");
191             return convertAttributesToPrincipalAttributesAndCache(p, sourceAttributes);
192         }
193 
194         final Map<String, List<Object>> principalAttributes = convertPrincipalAttributesToPersonAttributes(p);
195 
196         logger.debug("Merging current principal attributes with that of the repository via strategy [{}]",
197                 this.mergingStrategy.getClass().getSimpleName());
198         final Map<String, List<Object>> mergedAttributes =
199                 this.mergingStrategy.mergeAttributes(principalAttributes, sourceAttributes);
200 
201         return convertAttributesToPrincipalAttributesAndCache(p, mergedAttributes);
202     }
203 
204     /**
205      * Convert attributes to principal attributes and cache.
206      *
207      * @param p the p
208      * @param sourceAttributes the source attributes
209      * @return the map
210      */
211     private Map<String, Object> convertAttributesToPrincipalAttributesAndCache(final Principal p,
212                                                         final Map<String, List<Object>>  sourceAttributes) {
213         final Map<String, Object> finalAttributes = convertPersonAttributesToPrincipalAttributes(sourceAttributes);
214         addPrincipalAttributes(p.getId(), finalAttributes);
215         return finalAttributes;
216     }
217 
218     /**
219      * Add principal attributes into the underlying cache instance.
220      * @param id identifier used by the cache as key.
221      * @param attributes attributes to cache
222      * @since 4.2
223      */
224     protected abstract void addPrincipalAttributes(String id, Map<String, Object> attributes);
225 
226     /**
227      * Gets principal attributes from cache.
228      *
229      * @param p the principal
230      * @return the principal attributes from cache
231      */
232     protected abstract Map<String, Object> getPrincipalAttributes(Principal p);
233 
234     @Override
235     public String toString() {
236         return new ToStringBuilder(this)
237                 .append("attributeRepository", this.attributeRepository)
238                 .append("mergingStrategy", this.mergingStrategy)
239                 .append("expiration", this.expiration)
240                 .append("timeUnit", this.timeUnit)
241                 .toString();
242     }
243 
244     public long getExpiration() {
245         return this.expiration;
246     }
247 
248     public TimeUnit getTimeUnit() {
249         return this.timeUnit;
250     }
251 
252     @Override
253     public boolean equals(final Object obj) {
254         if (obj == null) {
255             return false;
256         }
257         if (obj == this) {
258             return true;
259         }
260         if (obj.getClass() != getClass()) {
261             return false;
262         }
263         final AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository rhs = (AbstractPrincipalAttributesRepository) obj;
264         return new EqualsBuilder()
265                 .append(this.timeUnit, rhs.timeUnit)
266                 .append(this.expiration, rhs.expiration)
267                 .isEquals();
268     }
269 
270     @Override
271     public int hashCode() {
272         return new HashCodeBuilder(13, 133)
273                 .append(this.timeUnit)
274                 .append(this.expiration)
275                 .toHashCode();
276     }
277 }
